network.param.config

Interface INodeConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeConfig

    public interface INodeConfig
    An abstract representation of param node config.

    This interface INodeConfig will hold the Param Node URL, PrivateKey.., INodeConfig defines below categories of operations:

    • setNode method to Connect ParamNetwork

    • setPrivateKey for sending any txn or getting the data from param network

    • getPrivateKey return private key.

    • getParamID for sending any txn or getting the data from param network

    • getPublicKey for sending any txn or getting the data from param network

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setNode

        void setNode(java.lang.String url)
        Connect ParamNetwork for a node.

        Method will set ParamNode URL, It will connect to ParamNode for a given url.

        Parameters:
        url - ParamNode URL,

      • setPrivateKey

        void setPrivateKey(java.lang.String privateKey)
            throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Set private key.

        Method will store privateKey in Hex string, If key is valid then it will convert into param related key format. If supplied private key is invalid then it will throw InvalidKeyException.

        Every transaction in param network will be encrypted and code signed using supplied private key.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private key
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - Throw invalid key exception if invalid key length or format is wrong

      • getPrivateKey

        java.lang.String getPrivateKey()
        Method to get private key.

        Get privateKey as a Hex string, If private key is not set then it will return null. Every transaction in param network will be encrypted and code signed using supplied private key.

        Returns:
        String Private key in Hex format.

      • getParamID

        java.lang.String getParamID()
        Method to get ParamID for a give private key.

        Get ParamID as a Hex string, If private key is not set then it will return null. Every transaction in param network validated using Public Key.

        Returns:
        ParamID as Hex String

      • getPublicKey

        java.lang.String getPublicKey()
        Method to get Public Key for a give private key.

        Get PublicKey as a Hex string, If private key is not set then it will return null.

        Returns:
        ParamID as Hex String
